scripts.dev: concurrently -k "vite --port 5173" "wait-on tcp:5173 && cross-env GDK_BACKEND=x11 XDG_SESSION_TYPE=x11 ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT=x11 LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 LIBVA_DRIVER_NAME=dummy electron . --ozone-platform=x11 --in-process-gpu --use-gl=swiftshader --disable-features=VaapiVideoDecoder,CanvasOopRasterization --disable-gpu --disable-gpu-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage --no-sandbox"
scripts.start: cross-env GDK_BACKEND=x11 XDG_SESSION_TYPE=x11 ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT=x11 LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 LIBVA_DRIVER_NAME=dummy electron . --ozone-platform=x11 --in-process-gpu --use-gl=swiftshader --disable-features=VaapiVideoDecoder,CanvasOopRasterization --disable-gpu --disable-gpu-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage --no-sandbox
